message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8250.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $8000, but that's as high as I can go.
I understand your hesitation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $8100, which is just $100 above your maximum offer. This is my final counteroffer.
I appreciate your final counteroffer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle of our previous offers, so I'll offer $8150. This is my final counteroffer.
I'm surprised you're willing to meet me in the middle, Bob. I'm going to make one more counteroffer. I'll offer it to you for $8200. This is my final counteroffer.
I've made a serious offer of $8150, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think this is a fair price, and I'd appreciate it if you could accept it.
I understand you're firm on your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $8150. I'll offer it to you for $8250, which is just $100 more than your offer. This is my final counteroffer.
I've made a serious offer of $8150, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think this is a fair price, and I'd appreciate it if you could accept it.
